item.title: WASM-4 and Zig
item.description: WASM-4 binaries running on browser *Fancy* graphics Press R to reset .wasm4 { padding: 10px; box-sizing: border-box; } #rotating_cube { width: 320px; height: 320px; } #rotating_cube canvas { width: 100%; height: 100%; image-rendering: pixelated; image-rendering: crisp-edges; } #snake { width: 320px; height: 320px; } #snake canvas { width: 100%; height: 100%; image-rendering: pixelated; image-rendering: crisp-edges; } import { run } from "
